roleset.name: be on the side of
roleset.note: FLANK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'flank' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment. (from flank.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: [*-1] Flanked by flight attendants, pilots and gate agents dressed in spiffy new blue uniforms, they-1 said Eastern has exceeded its operational goals and is filling its seats.
example.arg: by flight attendants, pilots and gate agents dressed in spiffy new blue uniforms
